meanings.definition: Incorrectly paired or matched, especially in a yoke.
meanings.sent1: The misyoked oxen struggled to pull the plow evenly.
meanings.sent2: The farmer realized the misyoked horses were causing the cart to veer off course.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a sight to see the misyoked chickens trying to share a nest.
meanings.sent4: The misyoked gears in the machine caused it to grind to a halt.
meanings.sent5: The misyoked puzzle pieces refused to fit together no matter how hard you tried.

meanings.definition: Joined together in an unsuitable or mismatched manner.
meanings.sent1: The misyoked colors of the painting clashed horribly.
meanings.sent2: The misyoked parts of the toy car made it impossible to assemble.
meanings.sent3: The misyoked socks made him look like he was ready for a funny party.
meanings.sent4: Their misyoked opinions led to constant arguments and misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The misyoked branches of the tree created a strange, twisted shape against the sky.
